text: Eina amukkasu hairi, nupa asibu Paradise-ta pukhatkhi haiba eina khang-i (amuksu madu tasengna hakchang oina pukhatkhibara nattraga uhanbiba amara haibadu eina khangde, madu Tengban Mapukhaktana khang-i), aduga waheina phongdokpa ngamdaba amadi mioibagi chinbalna ngangba ngamdaba wasing mahakna tare.
